title: Eating food items as gifts from non-Muslims festivals
transcript: to uh you yaser's question was about in India in their uh festivals I think it's called deis or something like this I forgot um they offer some of their fruits and candies to the gods and then they take it and they offer it to us can we take it the answer is yes the food is food it's vegetables it is halal it's not slaughtered to but if it was if it were meat then this is a different balll game but being uh uh sweet candies vegetables fruits and whatever yes you can take that and there's no problem inshallah
